attributes.action: call on the Queen to dissolve Parliament and hold a general election, for residents of the United Kingdom to provide a current sounding of how we feel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the recent months there has been an expose from different factions with regards to Ministers of Parliament expense claims.

We the undersigned believe that the Queen should dissolve the current Parliament, thereby creating the opportunity for a General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
